title: Simplify Development Task UI by removing clutter
description: Remove Branch display, PR status text, and Rebase button from Development Task cards to create a cleaner, more focused interface
asA: project manager using the AIPM workspace
iWant: the Development Task cards to display only essential information
soThat: I can focus on the core task details without visual distractions
acceptanceCriteria: Branch name paragraph is not rendered in task cards
Default 'PR created and ready for development' status text is not displayed
Rebase button is removed from task actions
Essential elements remain: assignee input, Generate Code button, conversation links
Error states and latest status updates are still shown when available
